# new()

**Type Method**

Creates a new URL session task.

## Declaration

```swift
class func new() -> Self
```

## Return Value

Don’t call this method directly. Instead, create tasks from a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession].

## Deprecated

- **init()**: Initializes an empty URL sesson task.
